column4: Esmé said. ""You're going out to dinner. It's all arranged. I made a reservation at Café Salmonella for seven o'clock. It's six o'clock now
column5: so you should get moving. You want to allow plenty of time to walk down all those stairs. But before you leave
column7: I have a present for each of you."""|"The Ersatz Elevator"|"Lemony Snicket"

column2: Jerome said. ""You should get plenty of rest for the auction tomorrow. I'll take you to the Veblen Hall at ten-thirty sharp

column1: ap 06:00|six|"""We're going to have to climb down
column3: ""on a rope. But where can we find rope at this time of night? Most hardware stores close at six."""|"The Ersatz Elevator"|"Lemony Snicket"

'""I couldn't find you or your siblings this morning to say good-bye. I had to leave early to buy yellow paper clips before heading over to the In Auction. Esmé will take you to Veblen Hall at ten-thirty sharp
column4: so be sure to be ready
column5: or she'll be very annoyed. See you then! Sincerely yours

column2: Violet said. ""It's already ten o'clock. All that climbing up and down the elevator shaft took much longer than I thought."""|"The Ersatz Elevator"|"Lemony Snicket"
